amendment.description: To provide funds ensuring Survivor Benefit Plan annuities are not reduced by the amount of dependency and indemnity compensation that military families receive, and to provide funds for "paid-up" SBP, offset by closing abusive corporate tax loopholes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3001 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3001 proposed by Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S2265-2266; text: CR S2265-2266) To provide funds ensuring Survivor Benefit Plan annuities are not reduced by the amount of dependency and indemnity compensation that military families receive, and to provide funds for "paid-up" SBP, offset by closing abusive corporate tax loopholes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3001 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3001 proposed by Senator Nelson FL.
